mapper.sql: bbsid, feedbackid, studentid, ctime, utime, studentname, teachername, teacherid, memo, type
mapper.select: SELECT ccib.bbsid, ccib.studentname, ccib.teachername, css.photo studentphoto, ct.photo teacherphoto, ccib.type, ccib.memo, ccib.ctime, ccib.status, csg.gradename, csc.classname FROM ck_course_item_bbs ccib LEFT JOIN ck_school_studentinfo css ON ccib.studentid = css.studentid LEFT JOIN ck_teacher ct ON ct.teacherid=ccib.teacherid LEFT JOIN ck_school_grade csg ON css.grade=csg.gradeid LEFT JOIN ck_school_class csc ON css.studentclass=csc.classid where ccib.isdel = '0' and ccib.status = '1' and feedbackid=#{CourseItemBbsCo.feedbackid} ORDER BY ccib.ctime DESC

SELECT ccib.bbsid, ccib.studentname, ccib.teachername, css.photo studentphoto, ct.photo teacherphoto, ccib.type, ccib.memo, ccib.ctime, csg.gradename, ccib.status, concat(csg.gradename,csc.classname) classname FROM ck_course_item_bbs ccib LEFT JOIN ck_school_studentinfo css ON ccib.studentid = css.studentid LEFT JOIN ck_teacher ct ON ct.teacherid=ccib.teacherid LEFT JOIN ck_school_grade csg ON css.grade=csg.gradeid LEFT JOIN ck_school_class csc ON css.studentclass=csc.classid WHERE ccib.feedbackid = #{courseItemFeedbackDetailCo.itemid} and ccib.isdel = '0' and ccib.status = '1' ORDER BY ccib.ctime DESC
